abstract: The smartphone is beginning to displace the GPS receiver as a convenient way for drivers to get directions to unknown destinations.
snippet: The smartphone is beginning to displace the GPS receiver as a convenient way for drivers to get directions to unknown destinations.
lead_paragraph: The smartphone is already the Swiss Army knife of the digital age  a quick flick of the finger can transform it into a camcorder, Web browser, gaming device or music player. For many consumers, the Apple iPhone and its competitors are versatile enough that they can get by without separate cameras and laptops.

headline.main: Sending GPS Devices the Way of the Tape Deck?
headline.print_headline: Sending GPS Devices the Way of the Tape Deck?

abstract: By giving away products like its new operating system, Google may be missing the opportunity to create a premium brand like that of Apple.
snippet: By giving away products like its new operating system, Google may be missing the opportunity to create a premium brand like that of Apple.
lead_paragraph: Is Google undercutting the value of its own brand by giving away everything free?

headline.main: Does Being Free Cheapen Google’s Brand?

abstract: Among thousands of add-on smartphone apps, only a few prove truly useful when it comes to organization.
snippet: Among thousands of add-on smartphone apps, only a few prove truly useful when it comes to organization.
lead_paragraph: Do you sometimes feel yourself slipping into an organizational abyss? Do you get behind in your e-mail, overlook a few appointments, forget your mom’s birthday and neglect to pick up milk on the way home?

headline.main: IPhone Apps to Organize Your Life
headline.print_headline: IPhone Apps to Organize Your Life
